name: Big Deer Target
description:
Become a skilled hunter by using your trusty sniper rifle, exploring the huge open woodland environment to find your mission target. Complete each sniper hunter level by using your sniper rifle to shoot all the deer, you will also have to navigate your way through the open wilderness so don't get lost!

FEATURES:
- First person shooter sniper action missions
- Realistic movement and fully functioning sniper rifle
- Exciting action adventure sniper mission
- Easy to play game controls
- Fully authentic lights and sounds
